def_cn: （用来构成形容词和名词，表示反对某种制度、做法或群体的人或事）反…
def_en: Anti- is used to form adjectives and nouns that describe someone or something that is opposed to a particular system, practice, or group of people.

def_cn: （用来构成形容词和名词）表示“防…”，“抗…”，“阻止”
def_en: Anti- is used to form adjectives and nouns that describe things that are intended to destroy something harmful or to prevent something from happening.
